attributes.action: call a general election forthwith because members of parliament have lost the trust of the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Across the United Kingdom, I believe that the majority of people no longer trust politicians. The most signifcant value of trust, that we place in those who we have elected to govern , has been eroded to such an extent that as one of the world's leading democracies the Prime Minister has a moral obligation to ask the permission of The Queen to dissolve parliament and hold a general election

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
